column5: I've had this unit for a few years now and its not working as well as it used to. Mainly, driving at any speed above trolling speed renders my screen blank or completely incorrect. My transducer has taken a bit of a beating over the past 5 years, its still in tact, just pretty scraped up on the underside. Would this be the root of my problems? Anyone have the same unit? How much should a new transducer run me?? Thanks.
